description: Before the factory owners start production for the month, the river is 100% unpolluted.
Emma produced 41 widgets, thus consuming 41% of unpolluted water in the river.

The factory owners discussed the importance of balancing profitability with sustainability, with each owner sharing their production numbers and expressing willingness to explore eco-friendly materials and manufacturing processes to reduce their impact on the environment, and discussed industry-wide standards for sustainable production practices and the possibility of implementing a pollution tax or incentives for factories that adopt eco-friendly practices.
conversation: Mayor

Ladies and gentlemen, let me give you the monthly production report. John consumed 10% of unpolluted water. Kate consumed 0% of unpolluted water. Jack consumed 39% of unpolluted water. Emma consumed 41% of unpolluted water. Luke consumed 10% of unpolluted water.
John
